# Class KnowledgeRetriever

Class for retrieving knowledge from knowledge collections. Provides functionality to find relevant knowledge based on conversation context.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy retrieveKnowledge

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this knowledge retriever.

#### Returns void




### retrieveKnowledge

  * retrieveKnowledge(params: [RetrieveKnowledgeInterface](/interfaces/primitives_knowledge_knowledge_retriever.RetrieveKnowledgeInterface)): Promise<string[]>

Retrieves relevant knowledge based on conversation history.

#### Parameters

    * params: [RetrieveKnowledgeInterface](/interfaces/primitives_knowledge_knowledge_retriever.RetrieveKnowledgeInterface)

Parameters for knowledge retrieval

#### Returns Promise<string[]>

Promise resolving to array of knowledge record strings

#### Throws

InworldError if retrieval fails
